10  import org.lindbergframework.exception.NoSuchBeanValidationException;
11  import org.lindbergframework.exception.ValidationClassCastException;
12  import org.lindbergframework.exception.ValidationException;
13  import org.lindbergframework.util.ReflectionUtil;
14  import org.lindbergframework.validation.IExecutorValidationItems;

19  import org.lindbergframework.validation.annotation.engine.IExecutorAnnotationEngine;
20  import org.lindbergframework.validation.executors.factory.ExecutorFactory;
21  import org.lindbergframework.validation.factory.ValidationFactory;

27  /**
28   *
29   * Engine padrÃ£o de execuÃ§Ã£o de validaÃ§Ãµes de beans que utilizam <br>
30   * as annotations Valid e Validations
31   * 
32   * 
33   * @author Victor Lindberg
34   *
35   */
36  @Component("executorAnnotationEngineDefault")
37  @Scope("prototype")
38  public class ExecutorAnnotationEngineImpl 
39                 implements IExecutorAnnotationEngine{
40  	
41  	private IExecutorValidationItems executorValidation;
42  	
43  	private List<ValidationItemActions> items = new Vector<ValidationItemActions>();
44  	
45  	public ExecutorAnnotationEngineImpl(){
46  		executorValidation = ExecutorFactory.newExecutorValidationItems();
47  	}
48  	
49  	public ExecutorAnnotationEngineImpl(IExecutorValidationItems executorValidation){
50  		this.executorValidation = executorValidation;
51  	}
52  
53  	public void addBeans(Object... objs) {
54  	   for (Object newBean : objs)
55  		   addNewBean(newBean);
56  	}
57  
58  	public void execute(Object... beansToValidate) throws ValidationException,
59  			ValidationClassCastException {
60  		addBeans(beansToValidate);
61  		execute();
62  	}
63  
64  	public void execute(ValidationMode mode, Object... beansToValidate)
65  			throws ValidationException, ValidationClassCastException {
66  	   addBeans(beansToValidate);
67  	   execute(mode);
68  	}
69  
70  	public void clearValidations() {
71  		executorValidation.clearValidations();
72  		items.clear();
73  	}
74  
75  	public void execute() throws ValidationException,
76  			ValidationClassCastException {
77  		commitItemsToExecutorItems(null);
78  		executorValidation.execute();
79  	}
80  
81  	public void execute(ValidationMode mode) throws ValidationException,
82  			ValidationClassCastException {
83  	   commitItemsToExecutorItems(null);	
84  	   executorValidation.execute(mode);
85  	}
86  
87  	public void execute(String separatorMessages) throws ValidationException,
88  			ValidationClassCastException {
89  	   commitItemsToExecutorItems(null);
90         executorValidation.execute(separatorMessages);		
91  	}
92  	
93  	public void executeInActions(String[] actions, Object... beansToValidate)
94  			throws ValidationException, ValidationClassCastException {
95         addBeans(beansToValidate);
96         commitItemsToExecutorItems(actions);
97         executorValidation.execute();
98  	}
99  	
100 	public void executeInActions(ValidationMode mode, String[] actions,
101 			Object... beansToValidate) throws ValidationException,
102 			ValidationClassCastException {
103 		addBeans(beansToValidate);
104 		commitItemsToExecutorItems(actions);
105 		executorValidation.execute(mode);
106 	}
107 	
108 	public void executeInActions(String... actions) throws ValidationException,
109 			ValidationClassCastException {
110        commitItemsToExecutorItems(actions);
111        executorValidation.execute();
112 	}
113 
114 	public void reset() {
115 	   executorValidation.reset();
116 	}
117 	
118 	public <E> List<IValidation<E>> getValidations() {
119 		return executorValidation.getValidations();
120 	}
121 	
122 	private void commitItemsToExecutorItems(String[] actions){
123 		for (ValidationItemActions item : items){
124 		   if ((actions != null && actions.length != 0 && 
125 				   containAnyAction(item, actions)) || /*se foi informada alguma action e o item tem ao menos uma das actions informadas*/ 
126 			   ((actions == null || actions.length == 0) && item.actions.length == 0))//nÃ£o foi informada nenhuma action
127 		      executorValidation.addValidationForSeveralItems(item.getValidation(), item.getItem());
128 		}
129 		
130 		items.clear();
131 	}
132 	
133 	private boolean containAnyAction(ValidationItemActions item, String[] actions){
134 		for (String act : actions)
135 		   if (ArrayUtils.contains(item.actions, act))
136 			   return true;
137 		
138 		return false;
139 	}
140 
141 	/**
142 	 * adiciona as validaÃ§Ãµes definidas via annotations ao conjunto <br>
143 	 * de validaÃ§Ãµes para serem processadas
144 	 */
145 	@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
146 	private void addNewBean(Object newBean){
147 		List<ValidField> annots = new ArrayList<ValidField>(); 
148 		loadAnnotations(newBean.getClass(),annots);
149            			
150 		  try{
151 		     for (ValidField valField : annots){
152 		    	Valid val = valField.getValid();
153 			    IValidation newValid = getValidation(val);
154 				     
155 				Object valorCampo = ReflectionUtil.getFieldValue(valField.getField(), newBean);
156 				     
157 				MsgType msgType = val.msgType();
158 				     
159 				if (val.msg().equals(""))
160 				   msgType = MsgType.NO_USING_CUSTOM;
161 				     
162 			 	addItem(new Item(val.separator(),valorCampo,msgType,val.msg()), newValid, val.actions());
163 			 }
164 		  }catch(ValidationException ex){
165 		     throw ex;
166 		  }catch(NoSuchBeanValidationException ex){
167 		      throw ex;
168 		  }catch(Exception ex){
169 		     throw new ValidationException("Ocorreu um erro adicionando o bean de validaÃ§Ã£o. Certifique-se que o bean referido estÃ¡ acessÃ­vel e pode ser instanciado");
170 		  }
171 	}
172 
173 	public void addItem(Item item,IValidation validation,String... actions){
174 		items.add(new ValidationItemActions(actions,item,validation));
175 	}
176 	
177 
178 	/**
179 	 * Retorna uma lista com as annotations Valid definidas para o campo <br>
180 	 * estejam elas diretamente anotadas no campo ou atravÃ©s da annotation Validations
181 	 */
182 	private void loadAnnotations(Class clazz,List<ValidField> validList){
183 		if (clazz == Object.class)
184 			return; 
185 			
186 		Field[] fields = clazz.getDeclaredFields();
187 		for (Field field : fields) {
188 			for (Annotation annot : field.getDeclaredAnnotations())
189 				if (Valid.class.isInstance(annot))
190 					validList.add(new ValidField((Valid) annot,field));
191 
192 			Validations validations = field.getAnnotation(Validations.class);
193 			if (validations != null){
194 				for (Valid valid : validations.value())
195 				   validList.add(new ValidField(valid, field));
196 			}
197 		}
198 		
199 		loadAnnotations(clazz.getSuperclass(), validList);
200 	}
201 	
202 	/**
203 	 * Retorna a implementaÃ§Ã£o de {@link IValidation} definida pela annotation Valid
204 	 */
205 	@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
206 	private IValidation getValidation(Valid valid) {
207 		Object beanValid = null;
208 		try {
209 			beanValid = ValidationFactory
210 					       .getValidationBeanReturningNullIfNoSuchBean(valid.value());
211 
212 			if (beanValid == null) {
213 				Class beanClass = Class.forName(valid.value());
214 				beanValid = beanClass.newInstance();
215 			} 
216 		} catch (Exception ex) {
217 			throw new NoSuchBeanValidationException("Bean validation not found : ["+valid.value()+"]");
218 		}
219 
220 		if (beanValid != null && beanValid instanceof IValidation)
221 			return (IValidation) beanValid;
222 
223 		throw new ValidationException("Validation nÃ£o corresponde a um bean de validaÃ§Ã£o");
224 	}
225

228 	@SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
229 	protected class ValidationItemActions{
230 		
231 		private String[] actions = new String[]{};
232 		private Item item;
233 		private IValidation validation;
234 		
235 		public ValidationItemActions(){
236 			//
237 		}
238 		
239 		public ValidationItemActions(String[] actions, Item item,IValidation validation){
240 			this.actions = actions;
241 			this.item = item;
242 			this.validation = validation;
243 		}
244 
245 		public String[] getActions() {
246 			return actions;
247 		}
248 
249 		public void setActions(String[] actions) {
250 			this.actions = actions;
251 		}
252 
253 		public Item getItem() {
254 			return item;
255 		}
256 
257 		public void setItem(Item item) {
258 			this.item = item;
259 		}
260 
261 		public IValidation getValidation() {
262 			return validation;
263 		}
264 
265 		public void setValidation(IValidation validation) {
266 			this.validation = validation;
267 		}
268 	}
269 	
270 	private class ValidField{
271 		private Valid valid;
272 		private Field field;
273 		
274 		public ValidField(Valid valid, Field field){
275 			setValid(valid);
276 			setField(field);
277 		}
278 
279 		public Valid getValid() {
280 			return valid;
281 		}
282 
283 		public void setValid(Valid valid) {
284 			this.valid = valid;
285 		}
286 
287 		public Field getField() {
288 			return field;
289 		}
290 
291 		public void setField(Field field) {
292 			this.field = field;
293 		}
294 		
295 		
296 	}
